# EventSeer Project Setup

React + Vite web app for discovering local events (flea markets, festivals, music events) on a map using Eventbrite API.

## Tech Stack
- React with Vite
- React-Leaflet for interactive maps
- Eventbrite API for event data
- Tailwind CSS for mobile-first styling
- Leaflet.markercluster for marker clustering

## Project Status
- [x] Create copilot-instructions.md file
- [x] Scaffold Vite React project
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Configure Tailwind CSS
- [x] Create component structure
- [x] Set up Eventbrite API service
- [x] Build main App component
- [x] Test and run development server

## Next Steps
1. Get an Eventbrite API key from https://www.eventbrite.com/platform/api
2. Create a `.env` file with: `VITE_EVENTBRITE_API_KEY=your_key_here`
3. The app is running at http://localhost:5173
